summary: The implementation covers most requirements comprehensively. The frontend includes scroll animations, hero section, services grid, doctor profile, testimonials, contact features, before/after slider, and admin panel with authentication. The backend provides appointment management, clinic status, content management, and access control. However, several animation-related requirements (REQ-2 parallax, REQ-4 Lottie animations) are missing or not fully implemented. The color palette (REQ-20) appears implemented via CSS variables but needs verification in actual rendering.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add parallax scrolling effect to background images creating depth perception as users scroll
missing_requirements.reason: Hero section has a static background with gradient overlay but no parallax scrolling effect implementation. The component does not include scroll-based position transforms for the background image.

missing_requirements.requirement: Integrate Lottie animations for dental procedures (cleaning, implants) that sync with accompanying text descriptions
missing_requirements.reason: No Lottie animation library integration found. ServiceDetail page and components do not include Lottie player or animation sync logic. Only static service icons are used.
